posts.raw_content:
Turning Point was basically the entire grassroots organization for Trump 2024. I remember liberal pundits saying “stupid Trump is relying entirely on volunteer grassroots organization Turning Point. Kamala is paying door knockers. Kamala is going to win Iowa!”

Charlie beat a billion dollar machine just by motivating people (like me) to get off my ass, register voters and talk to voters. He created a brilliant app which made it effortless. It was genius.

While he was alive I recognized his greatness in this aspect — but what I didn’t give him credit for was his genius rhetoric. Every time I heard him on his podcast or Change My Mind show I’d think “this is boring. This is normie stuff. I’m too smart for this.”

But I wasn’t his intended audience. His audience was normies and kids — and he did an unfathomably good job at persuading them.

He also moved the needle like nobody else. Topics like White Genocide and black crime rates were taboo before Charlie mainstreamed them. He took on topics that Trump couldn’t touch (for obvious political reasons). 

You could show a boomer or ignorant kid his clips and they would instantly be red pilled. You show them someone like Nick Fuentes and they think “oh, I guess the right really is a bunch of bigots!”

He was so f’n brilliant. He was so based but knew EXACTLY how to word his opinions to red pill normies. He boldly spoke the truth and risked his life for us, literally stepping into the Lion’s Den of mentally ill liberal mobs while I shied away from being candid to libtards at a family dinner. 

He did this all since he was like 16 years old. 15+ years of outstanding work. He did it all while staying classy as can be and living his life by the model of Jesus Christ. Nothing but honesty and love. Not a hate bone in his body. He truly lived by the *Father forgive them, for they know not what they do* Bible verse.

I am starting to believe he was some sort of angel sent to us by God. There’s Trump, there’s Charlie, and there’s everyone else. What a Legend.
